title: Covered parking spaces and garages shall be raised at least 15 cm
clause_text: Covered parking spaces and garages shall be raised at least 15 cm. above the surrounding ground level and shall be satisfactory drained. Size and dimension of habitable rooms, shall be as per requirement and convenience of the owner. The minimum and maximum height of a habitable room shall be given in Table No.9-A hereunder :
section: Off street parking requirement for various Planning Authorities / Areas

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Covered parking spaces and garages shall be raised at least 15 cm. above the surrounding ground level and shall be satisfactory drained.
